import React, {useState} from 'react' import {useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import PayPal from '../paypal'; const CheckoutSection = () => { const location = useLocation(); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState(''); const isKhmer = location.pathname.startsWith('/kh'); const currentLanguage = location.pathname.split('/')[1] || 'en'; const { state } = location || {}; const { cart = [], total = 0, isCouponApplied = false } = state || {}; const subtotal = cart.reduce((total, product) => total + product.price * product.quantity, 0); const discount = isCouponApplied ? subtotal - 1 : 0; const finalTotal = isCouponApplied ? 1 : subtotal; const handlePaymentSelection = (method) => { setPaymentMethod(method); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!paymentMethod) { alert(isKhmer ? 'សូមជ្រើសរើសមធ្យោបាយទូទាត់' : 'Please select a payment method'); return; } if (paymentMethod === 'creditCard') { alert(isKhmer ? 'ការទូទាត់តាមកាតបានដំណើរការជោគជ័យ' : 'Credit/Debit Card payment processed successfully!'); } else if (paymentMethod === 'paypal') { alert(isKhmer ? 'ការទូទាត់តាម PayPal បានដំណើរការជោគជ័យ' : 'PayPal payment processed successfully!'); } }; return (
{/* */}
Have a coupon? Click here to enter your code
{isKhmer ? 'សេចក្ដីលម្អិតនៃការចំណាយ' : 'Billing Details'}

Fist Name*

Last Name*

Country*

Address*

Town/City*

Country/State*

Postcode / ZIP*

Phone*

Email*

{isKhmer ? 'ការបញ្ចាទិញរបស់អ្នក' : 'Your order'}

{isKhmer ? 'ផលិតផល' : 'Product'} {isKhmer ? 'សរុប' : 'Total'}
{cart.length > 0 ? (
    {cart.map((product, index) => (
  • {product.title.length > 10 ? `${product.title.substring(0, 10)}...` : product.title} x {product.quantity}{' '} ${(product.price * product.quantity).toFixed(2)}
    • ))}
) : (

No items in cart.

)}
    {isCouponApplied && (
  • Discount -${discount.toFixed(2)}
    • )}
  • Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
  • Total ${finalTotal.toFixed(2)}
{/*
*/}
{/* */}
) } export default CheckoutSection
